statements: UPDATE FootballClub SET championships_won = 5 WHERE club_id = 1;
UPDATE FootballClub SET player_transfers = '[{"player": "John Doe", "transfer_fee": 1000000}]' WHERE club_name = 'Real Madrid';
UPDATE FootballClub SET championships_won = championships_won + 1 WHERE club_id = 1;
UPDATE FootballClub SET player_transfers = '{"in": ["Player A", "Player B"], "out": ["Player C"]}' WHERE club_name = 'Manchester United';
UPDATE clubs SET championships_won = 5 WHERE club_id = 'a7f17da4-eca6-4c75-b815-2b960c88ec83';
UPDATE events SET manager_id = '58933e2b-27f2-4b6a-9c87-375205b644e8' WHERE event_id = '2d2f6975-c7f4-4d07-9601-4a6f60871b3f';
UPDATE clubs SET club_name = 'Real Madrid', championships_won = 35, updated_at = NOW(), created_at = '2022-01-01' WHERE club_id = 'c6747a6f-3e20-4288-9e0a-7bd60e1951a5';

UPDATE events SET player_id = 'e5dd48da-bad0-4fed-ae85-3e63f6de9907', manager_id = '6b47e4fd-8305-4b04-8907-8f95c4d7509f', event_date = '2022-10-15', event_type = 'Final' WHERE event_id = 'f3e7f7ad-d1ec-441c-a2e3-e59e911f96f2';
UPDATE club_championships SET championships_won = championships_won + 1 WHERE club_name = 'Real Madrid';
UPDATE player_transfers SET transfer_fee = 15000000.50, new_club = 'Manchester United' WHERE player_name = 'Cristiano Ronaldo';
UPDATE club_championships SET championships_won = championships_won + 1 WHERE club_name = 'Manchester United'
UPDATE player_transfers SET transfer_fee = 2500000.00, new_club = 'Barcelona', previous_club = 'Real Madrid' WHERE player_name = 'Cristiano Ronaldo'
UPDATE championships SET championship_name = 'Premier League' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_transfers SET transfer_fee = 5000000, to_club = 'FC Barcelona' WHERE player_name = 'Lionel Messi';
UPDATE championships SET championship_name='Premier League' WHERE club_name='Manchester United';
UPDATE player_transfers SET from_club='Chelsea' WHERE transfer_fee>5000000;
UPDATE FootballClubs SET country='Spain' WHERE club_name='Real Madrid';
UPDATE PlayerTransfers SET transfer_fee=25000000 WHERE player_name='Lionel Messi';
UPDATE FootballClubs SET founded_year = 1900 WHERE club_name = 'Manchester United';
UPDATE PlayerTransfers SET transfer_fee = 25000000.00, transfer_date = '2023-06-15' WHERE player_name = 'Cristiano Ronaldo';
